subject: How to make break pedal less stiff?
description_text:
Hello,

I'm using the factory default settings for my break pedal (Simsonn Plus X Racing )and I find it very stiff? Any recommendation to reduce it?
Thanks,
Sebastien

conversations.body_text: Hi Sebastien Prompt,  The factory default uses red dampers with a hardness of 60HA. You can calibrate the pedal force directly by pressing it with your foot, or manually set the maximum force using kilograms (kg) in the software.Â
